name: TC_09_05_03 | Verify password recovery process
description: To verify that user can reset the password.
descriptionHtml: To verify that user can reset the password.

testStage.description: To verify that user can reset the password.

steps.name: Verify an email with a verification code is sent to the user's registered email address
Wait for the timer to complete.
Verify the "Resend code" button is enabled
Verify clicking on "Resend code" button again, resends the verification code to the email address
Fill in the "Password reset code" input field.
Verify user is redirected to the Login page
Verify user can log in with the new password
